article.title: Symetrics Industries Receives Navy Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Symetrics Industries is being awarded a $6.5 million firm-fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for the procurement of 500 Technique Control Modulators (TCM) units, 950 TCM kits, and the engineering and technical support and repair services for the TCM units/kits for the U.S. Navy and U.S. Air Force in support of the Airborne Threat Simulation Organization.
